title: Ping 120-150 ms
body: My ping was 30-50 ms , today, all day its 120 . I test my internet connectionand and  my internet works fine. How to fix this? Any solotiuon?

replies.body: Even though your connection is fine, you can still have network issues maintaining a connection to the game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of why you're getting these input delays or lag spikes.  The results will also provide some troubleshooting steps specific to your case.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
Bro, try playing tomorrow. Maybe it will be good again.
